custom_params.label: CHN
custom_params.tooltip: MOTU M6 input channel (0=Input 1, 5=Input 6). Attenuate with front-panel GAIN until Peak < 0.95.

custom_params.label: LVL
custom_params.tooltip: Digital gain normalization. 1.0 = unity, 4.0 = max boost. Use to match IdealOverlay amplitude.

custom_params.label: SYM
custom_params.tooltip: Adjust to align IdealOverlay bias with hardware DC asymmetry. 0.5 = centered.

custom_params.label: SAT
custom_params.tooltip: Adjust to match IdealOverlay saturation curve with hardware peak rounding.
